name: btd/monolog-snp-handler
description: Monolog handler that send notifications to Snarl on Windows (support protocol SNP 3.1 only)

scripts.md: phpmd src xml cleancode,codesize,controversial,design,naming,unusedcode --reportfile build/phpmd.xml --ignore-violations-on-exit && phpmd src text cleancode,codesize,controversial,design,naming,unusedcode --ignore-violations-on-exit
